sentence.Network_en: The prisoners of war were treated inhumanely.
sentence.Network_cn: 战俘遭受了不人道的对待.

list.abs: I think this is deliberate on the government's part . inhumane methods of euthanasia are used . unqualified are euthanising these poor defenseless creatures who writhe and die in absolute agony .我认为政府是明知故犯，在这些死牢里以不人道的方式安乐死，这些没受过训练，不符合资格的人，负责将这些可怜、没有防御能力的动

and though he did find evidence of isolated cases of rape , inhuman treatment and " wilful killing " of civilians , they were not sufficiently widespread to meet the threshold of gravity required .最后，他的确发现数起个案针对平民的强奸、人道待遇和“故意谋杀”并找到证据，但这些情况并未蔓延到需要给予严重关注的地步
She is an inhumane judge ., 她是个冷酷的法官.

sentences.sentence: "the prisoners of war were treated inhumanely"

auth_sentence.content: If population is not reduced humanely, it will be reduced inhumanely.
auth_sentence.res_content: If population is not reduced humanely, it will be reduced inhumanely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If population is not reduced humanely, it will be reduced inhumanely.

auth_sentence.content: I only hope some efforts are made to humanely reduce world population before it is inhumanely reduced by the environment.
auth_sentence.res_content: I only hope some efforts are made to humanely reduce world population before it is inhumanely reduced by the environment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I only hope some efforts are made to humanely reduce world population before it is inhumanely reduced by the environment.
